item.title: Network: Edgeryders
item.description:
Edgeryders

  • a global community of (mostly) young Europeans
  • we aspire to put our time and effort into solving the global societal, economic, environmental, security and energy problems threatening Europe and humanity in general
  • we care about things like open access to knowledge; openness and transparency of government; food security; smart communities; decentralised economic architecture; free/open source software; and art. If you think you might be one of us, do join. See more at: http://edgeryders.eu/en/page/get-involved#sthash.TjpuEdkx.dpuf
